test

Class FileSetTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • test.FileSetTest

  • public class FileSetTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Full test harness for the FileSet class. These tests ensure that all methods associated with a FileSet perform to specification.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Zack Burch

      • source

        private java.lang.String source
        To set up your system to run these tests, you must first do the following... 1) Create a folder on your desktop that contains two text files, "test.txt" and "test2.txt" 2) Mount Google Drive on your machine. In the root of your Google Drive, create two folders titled: "Test" and "Test2"
